record.description: Aaron Filler and Valerie Rouluk are two of the stars of "Publish or Perish," the original musical comedy that the Blackfriars will present May 7, 8, and 9 in Mandel Hall on the campus of the University of Chicago. In song, dance, and dialogue, the comedy presents one version of a struggle between two professors for a single tenured position.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
